user.title: TeamSnap OAuth Credentials
user.description:
Enter your TeamSnap OAuth application credentials.

1. Register an OAuth app at https://auth.teamsnap.com
2. Set the redirect URI to: {redirect_uri}
3. Enter your Client ID and Client Secret below

pick_implementation.description: Please pick how you want to authenticate with TeamSnap.

error.oauth_setup_error: Unable to initialize OAuth flow. Please ensure your Client ID and Client Secret are correct and try again.
